message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. Given its unique features and potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,300,000. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider a price up to $800,000 for the product. I hope we can find a mutually beneficial solution.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your position, but the value of this product significantly exceeds that amount. I'm willing to come down to $1,100,000. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the reduction, I still need to stay within my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $950,000 for the product. I hope this brings us closer to a mutually agreeable solution.
